about_the_game:
People on the island know him as El Presidente, their absolute ruler. Little they suspect that he is also the Masked Avenger, the mysterious dashing rogue that wages war against crime, rebels and political dissidents. Use the new labor camp to put convicts to good use, wear the original Zorro mask and use the Alter Ego trait to improve crime safety.

Key Features:

  • New building: Labor camp (convicts grow corn, sugar or tobacco)
  • New trait: Alter Ego (improves crime safety, boosts relations with nationalists and tourism)
  • New outfit: Zorro (male avatar)
  • New mission: The Masked Avenger

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8.5
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 4GB Memory
  • Graphics: 256MB*
  • Hard Drive:6GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: The following graphics cards are not supported: ATI X1xxx series, ATI HD2xxx series, Intel GMA series, NVIDIA 7xxx series and NVIDIA 8xxx series.

    The following cards require you to have 8GB of system RAM: Intel HD3000, NVIDIA 9400, Intel HD4000 and NVIDIA 320M.
